contents.text: Thank you for calling Braintree in San Francisco, your partner in building connected commerce experiences to help grow your revenue.
For new sales and product inquiries, press 1.
For pricing information and product demonstrations, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our product specialist.

navigationGoals: Quickly see a product demo and clarify pricing plans.
I’d like a walkthrough of your payment gateway features for my veteran-owned online store.
I’d like a live product demonstration of your payment SDK and an overview of your pricing tiers.
I’d like a demo of the payment system and pricing details.
I’d like to schedule a demonstration of your payment API and get detailed pricing for my project.

contents.text: To speak with a sales representative, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Speak with sales about enterprise package options and volume discounts.
I need to speak with sales about custom pricing packages for my growing business.
I want to talk to a sales representative about enterprise volume pricing and contract terms.
I need to speak with a sales rep to open a merchant account.
I want to speak with a sales representative about enterprise integration options for our lab’s payment system.

contents.text: For customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
For integration and API support, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our API support team.

navigationGoals: Get help resolving an API integration error in our checkout.
I need help integrating Braintree’s API into my website’s checkout flow.
I need help debugging my API integration, specifically OAuth authentication and webhook events.
I need help integrating Braintree’s API into my website.
I need technical support troubleshooting my API integration in my development environment.

contents.text: For billing and account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a billing specialist.

navigationGoals: Confirm a recent invoice charge and update my billing information.
I want to review and correct a billing discrepancy on my latest invoice.
I have questions about my monthly billing statement, invoice details, and want to update my payment method.
I have a question about a charge on my billing statement.
I need to review my latest invoice and adjust my billing plan for the next period.
